IVisualizationClient (ITF)
IVisualizationClient (ITF)
Â¶
INTERFACE IVisualizationClient EXTENDS __SYSTEM.IQueryInterface
Shows the information, needed to choose a client (with the client filter).
See also IVisualizationClientRaw if the pointer to the VisuStructClientData is needed.
Note
This interface is not intended for being implemented by functionblocks outside this library as it might be extended in the future.
